> Thank you for the patch to optimize the Linux kernel image size. _Optimize_ is pretty generic. Could you please make the commit message summary/title more specific (and a statement (by adding a verb in imperative mood)). Maybe:
> 
> > Reduce image size by disabling graphics and multimedia drivers
> 
> Also, please amend the commit message to add the Linux kernel image size before and after the boot.

Thanks for review. Recommended changes are done.

> Hi @Pavan-Nokia , @saiarcot895 can you confirm if this PR is safe to merge in 202411. Does this PR impact any other platform

Hi @arlakshm  This PR enables the driver for the RTC devices to be included as a module in the kernel. This will not impact any other platforms.
sync'ed offline on this one. this change needs to go to 202503 instead of 202412.
@arlakshm This PR is needed to be cherry-picked to 202503 for X3B.
